pkgmetadata.longdescription: `cruise-control-client` is an API-complete Python client for [`cruise-control`](https://github.com/linkedin/cruise-control).It comes with a command-line interface to the client (`cccli`) (see [README](https://github.com/linkedin/cruise-control/tree/master/docs/wiki/Python%20Client)).`cruise-control-client` can also be used in Python applications needing programmatic access to `cruise-control`.
